Description.Name: Not Cut For Discipline.
Description.Details: The day after your eighteen birthday, a heated discussion with your CO about discipline made you decide to leave.

OptionDescription:
After you joined the mercenary company, the life of a pilot became more and more demanding due to your lack of skills, until one day during a discussion with an officer, you decided to quit.

After presenting your resignation, you took off with the bandit king's [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralPhoenixHawk],Phoenix Hawk]] and set off to find a new life to call your own.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorPiloting],Piloting]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]]
BioDescription: Once a promising ex-slave, the pressure of military routine and discipline finally made you quit and leave the merc company. Deciding to try something else, you took the bandit king's Phoenix Hawk you stole from your former dead master and set off to find a new life to call your own.
